summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 1999 BMW 323 I.  WHILE MOVING THE GEAR SHIFT LEVER FROM PARK TO REVERSE, THE VEHICLE WOULD NOT SHIFT GEARS.  SHE HAD TO MANUALLY PUSH THE VEHICLE INTO DRIVE IN ORDER TO SWITCH GEARS. SHE WAS ADVISED THAT THE TRANSMISSION WAS FAILING. HOWEVER, NO REPAIRS WERE MADE.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 135000.
